glsa.title: FontForge: Arbitrary Code Execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in FontForge, which can lead to arbitrary code execution.

background.p: FontForge is a PostScript font editor and converter.

description.p: A vulnerabilitiy has been discovered in FontForge. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All FontForge users should upgrade to the latest version:
